Milestone1.name: Copies adults and friends (like running when other children run)
Milestone1.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone10.name: Follows instructions with 2 or 3 steps
Milestone10.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone11.name: Can name most familiar things
Milestone11.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone12.name: Understands words like 'in', 'on' and 'under'
Milestone12.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone13.name: Says first name, age, and sex
Milestone13.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone14.name: Names a friend
Milestone14.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone15.name: Says works like 'I', 'me', 'we' and 'you' and some plurals (cars, dogs, cats)
Milestone15.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone16.name: Talks well enough for strangers to understand most of the time
Milestone16.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone17.name: Carries on a conversation using 2 to 3 sentences
Milestone17.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone18.name: Can work toys with buttons, levers, and moving parts
Milestone18.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone19.name: Plays make-believe with dolls, animals, and people
Milestone19.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone2.name: Shows affection for friends without prompting
Milestone2.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone20.name: Does puzzles with 3 or 4 pieces
Milestone20.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone21.name: Understands what 'two' means
Milestone21.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone22.name: Copies a circle with a pencil or crayon
Milestone22.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone23.name: Turns book pages one at a time
Milestone23.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone24.name: Builds towers of more than 6 blocks
Milestone24.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone25.name: Screws and unscrews jar lids or turns door handle
Milestone25.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone26.name: Climbs well
Milestone26.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone27.name: Runs easily
Milestone27.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone28.name: Pedals a tricycle (3-wheeled bike)
Milestone28.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone29.name: Walks up and down stairs, one foot on each step
Milestone29.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone3.name: Takes turns in games
Milestone3.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone30.name: Points to show others something interesting (age 18-month milestone)
Milestone30.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone31.name: Plays well with two or three children in a group (age 4 milestone)
Milestone31.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone32.name: Practices using safety scissors (age 4 milestone) at school
Milestone32.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone33.name: Tells a story (age 4 milestone) while pretending to read
Milestone33.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone34.name: Shows independence (age 2 milestone) by trying to brush his own teeth
Milestone34.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone4.name: Shows concern for a crying friend
Milestone4.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone5.name: Understands the idea of 'mine' and 'his' or 'hers'
Milestone5.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone6.name: Shows a wide range of emotions
Milestone6.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone7.name: Separates easily  from mom and dad
Milestone7.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone8.name: May get upset with major changes in routine
Milestone8.notes: This is the note for this milestone

Milestone9.name: Dresses and undresses self
Milestone9.notes: This is the note for this milestone
